usage.cn: 不要装作什么都知道，除非你的名字是谷歌
usage.eng: Unless your name is Google, stop acting like you know everything.

usage.cn: 我装作一切都无所谓，虽然我已心力交瘁。
usage.eng: I acted like it wasn't a big deal, when really it was breaking my heart

usage.cn: 有时候，转身离开要好过假装若无其事的坚持。
usage.eng: Sometimes, walking away is better than standing there, acting like it doesn't bother you.

usage.cn: 若无其事，原来是最好的报复。生活得更好，是为了自己
usage.eng: Acting as if nothing borne in mind is the best revenge.It's all for myself to live better.
